metadata.title: PIAZZA PISANO ART FOR HOME AND GIFTS AL PISANO Italian Wall Decor Fede Speranza Amore Faith Hope Love Door Topper
features: Created from an original wood carving by artist Al Pisano
Italian words translate to Faith Hope Love
Measures 27 inches wide and 6 inches high
Hand painted and stained to capture all the detail of the original carved art
Made in USA and includes recessed hangers
description: Our Italian Decor Door Topper Plaque Faith Hope Love is created from an original wood carving by artist Al Pisano. Each piece is cast from the original and then hand painted and stained to capture all the intricate details of Al's original carving. Made under the supervision of the artist; due to our hand crafted process no two are exactly alike. Include hangers, made in the USA. Measures 27 inches wide by 6 inches high and about 3 inches deep.
